exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term H : preDTA_ref_ok p H1 : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "match ?M1863 with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end" with "forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state p a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state p b = Some s0".
In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term H : preDTA_ref_ok p H1 : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "dta_ref_ok_check ?M1863 = true" with "reconnaissance p a t".
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true" on hypothesis of type "preDTA_ref_ok p".

In environment H2 : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true H0 : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d p : preDTA a : ad H : preDTA_ref_ok p ladj : state H3 : MapGet state (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) a = Some ladj c : ad tl : term_list l : prec_list H1 : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H5 : liste_reconnait (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) l tl Unable to unify "match ?M3200 with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end" with "reconnaissance p a (app c tl)".

In environment H6 : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true H4 : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d p : preDTA a : ad H : preDTA_ref_ok p ladj : state H3 : MapGet state (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) a = Some ladj c : ad tl : term_list l : prec_list H1 : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H5 : liste_reconnait (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) l tl Unable to unify "preDTA_ref_ok p" with "reconnaissance p a (app c tl)".

In environment H2 : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true H0 : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d p : preDTA a : ad H : preDTA_ref_ok p ladj : state H3 : MapGet state (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) a = Some ladj c : ad tl : term_list l : prec_list H1 : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H5 : liste_reconnait (non_coacc_kill (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) (predta_coacc_states (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a)) l tl Unable to unify "MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l" with "reconnaissance p a (app c tl)".

original: intros d t H. split. - intros H1. unfold reconnait, dta_kill_non_coacc. destruct d as [p a]. simpl in *. unfold DTA_ref_ok in H. simpl in H. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_dir. apply dta_ref_ok_check_complete. apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct. apply H. apply H1. - intros H1. unfold reconnait, dta_kill_non_coacc. destruct d as [p a]. simpl in *. unfold DTA_ref_ok in H. simpl in H. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_dir in H1. apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H. apply dta_ref_ok_check_complete. apply H. apply H1.
